title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library for Ollama; chat, embed, pull and manage models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers; chat, generate, list, delete models.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package exposing Ollama models as LLM, chat and embedding components.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat UI, model management, multi-user, OpenAI-compatible endpoints).

title: ollama-gui
summary: Lightweight Flutter desktop GUI for chatting with Ollama models (macOS/Linux/Windows).

title: ollama-cli
summary: Interactive CLI wrapper with fuzzy-find model picker, conversation persistence and syntax themes.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: GitHub Copilot-style plugin for VS Code that uses local Ollama models for inline suggestions.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official container images (CPU & CUDA) with multi-arch support and compose examples.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG starter using Ollama embeddings + Chroma vector DB + Streamlit UI.

title: ollama-agents
summary: Experimental multi-agent framework letting Ollama models call tools and delegate tasks.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community cookbook with 40+ recipes: PDF chat, voice bots, function calling, fine-tune adapters.

title: ollama-npm
summary: Official npm package delivering the JS/TS client for Node and browser environments.

title: ollama-pypi
summary: Official PyPI package for the Python client; supports 3.8+ and async workflows.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration providing OllamaGenerator and OllamaEmbedder components for pipelines.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Self-hosted Discord bot that brings local LLM chatting to any server with slash commands.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin for AI-assisted writing using Ollama models with templated prompts.

title: ollama-huggingface
summary: Scripts to convert & quantize Hugging Face models into Ollama Modfile format automatically.

title: ollama-ray
summary: Ray Serve deployment wrapper for Ollama enabling distributed autoscaling and batch serving.
